mapper.select: select c.id, c.name from category c where c.status = #{status} order by c.id, c.name

select f.id, f.name, f.icon_url, ifnull(num.thread_num, 0) thread_num, ifnull(num.post_num, 0) post_num, num.last_reply_time from forum f left join category_forum cf on cf.forum_id = f.id left join category c on cf.category_id = c.id left join ( select t.forum_id, count(distinct t.id) thread_num, count(distinct p.id) post_num, max(p.create_time) last_reply_time from thread t left join post p on p.thread_id = t.id) num on num.forum_id = f.id where c.status = 1 and f.status = 1 and c.id = #{categoryId} order by f.id, f.name
